sense.gloss: to get drunk, to become intoxicated
to feel sick (e.g. in a vehicle), to become nauseated
to be elated, to be exalted, to be spellbound, to be in raptures

sdata.j: あいつ|↑酔↑↓よ↓う|と↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑変↑↓か↓わるから↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑飲↑↓の↓みたくないんだよ。
sdata.e: He's a different person when he's drunk, so I don't like to drink with him.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑息子↑↓むすこ↓はいつもバスに↑乗↑↓の↓ると|↑酔↑↓よ↓う|の。
sdata.e: My son always gets sick when he rides a bus.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|↑酔↑↓よ↓う|と↑手↑↓て↓がつけられない。
sdata.e: He is out of control when drunk.

sdata.j: あの↑人↑↓ひと↓、|↑酔↑↓よ↓う|と↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑変↑↓か↓わってさ、くどくど↑話↑↓はな↓しだすから、あまり↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑飲↑↓の↓みたくないんだ。
sdata.e: You know, when that guy drinks he changes. He keeps talking on and on, so I don't really want to drink with him.

sdata.j: トムが↑車↑↓くるま↓に|↑酔↑↓よ↓う|ことってあるの？
トムは|↑酔↑↓よ↓う|と↑猫↑↓ねこ↓ちゃんになっちゃうね。
sdata.e: Tom becomes a cat when he gets drunk.
